services.name: Property Listing API
services.description: Enable real estate agencies to integrate property listings with details such as location, pricing, and features. This allows seamless updates and client-side browsing.

services.name: Customer Relationship Management Service
services.description: Facilitate organizations to manage stakeholder communications and records, including prospective buyer interactions and historical inquiries.

services.name: Real-Time Pricing Analysis Tool
services.description: Provide real-time property pricing insights based on market trends, comparable sales, and regional statistics to assist buyers and sellers in negotiation.

services.name: Rental Verification System
services.description: Verify and validate rental applicant credentials and history to improve tenant selection and ensure compliance with leasing policies.

services.name: Investment Portfolio Management Service
services.description: Support individual and institutional investors in analyzing and managing their real estate investment portfolios, offering tools for performance tracking and optimization.
